name: Kids & Play Cars, Trucks, Emergency & Construction Vehicles Puzzles – Free
name_original: Kids & Play Cars, Trucks, Emergency & Construction Vehicles Puzzles – Free
description:
If your child likes vehicles and puzzle games it's a perfect app for it!
With 30 fun puzzles to choose from and 3 difficulty levels it offers a lot of smart fun for every child.


FEATURES:

-11 images of vehicles in free version (30 in paid version like cars, boats, planes, construction, military and emergency vehicles)
- 3 difficulty levels
- Colorful and kid-friendly User Interface
- Recommended for kids age 2 - 8 years old
- Great way to help children to work on fine motor-skills, critical thinking skills, visual-spatial skills and more

________________________________

KNOW WHAT'S INSIDE
As a MOMs with Apps member, we follow the 
"Know what's inside" best practices for kids’ apps
________________________________

PRIVACY DISCLOSURE

● this app does not collect or share any user's personal information
● this app does not contain social networks integration
● this app contains ads
● this app contains single In-App Purchase that unlocks all the content and remove ads
● this app contains "More Apps" external links on a separate pages

For our privacy policy please visit www.jumpapp.eu
